abstract: Modifies the date format style to use the specified second format style.

codeExamples.code:
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:05 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().second(.defaultDigits)) // 5
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().second(.twoDigits)) // 05
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().second()) // 5

# second(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified second format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func second(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.Second = .defaultDigits) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The second format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified second style.

## Discussion

Values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Second] are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Second/defaultDigits] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Second/twoDigits].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Second] format styles applied to a date:

```swift
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:05 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().second(.defaultDigits)) // 5
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().second(.twoDigits)) // 05
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().second()) // 5
```

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Second/defaultDigits] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

## Specifying the Time Format

- **hour(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified hour format style.
- **minute(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified minute format style.
- **secondFraction(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified second fraction format style.
- **timeZone(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified time zone format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.TimeStyle**: Type that defines time styles varied in length or components included.
